title: Microsoft Windows 3.1. V.1. Introductory skills
brief_description: This step-by-step training video is an introduction to Word for Windows 3.1. Narrated by Sheila Swanson, you will learn how to navigate your desktop, how to use menus and commands within the program and also provides a useful guide to how to load Windows onto your computer.
